ComicInfo.Summary:
Sunburn: In 2250 Earth has colonised the Sun, and one of the colonists has a problem: he's just murdered his wife and needs to dispose of her corpse.
The Video Game, Part 3: Tallon finally avenges his brother.
The Marauders, Part 1: Rogue meets the Marauders, a group of deserters from both sides of the war who've united to serve their own ends.
Destiny's Angels, Part 2: While Judge Dredd is searching for Fink, the Judge Child resurrects Mean Machine to cause him more trouble.
The Kloistar Run, Part 4: The High Priest of Kloistar is determined to sacrifice Garp.
